items.sentence: Tom and Mary are allowed to do anything they want.
The more the crowd drank, the noisier they became.
If you're not going to drink this, I won't either.
During the intermission, we had drinks at the bar.
It infuriates me when people spit on the sidewalk.
There's no one on the roster who can play defense.
Tom wasn't waiting for you. He was waiting for me.
My big brother finished his homework very quickly.
French is only one of the languages Tom can speak.
I think Tom is waiting for someone to pick him up.
